website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few quirks, this brewer is a  must-have for anyone who loves cold coffee. Can also double as an ice tea maker.
pros: Distances itself from other models on our list for being the only one that's specifically designed for cold-brew coffee
Can easily be stored in the fridge so you can grab a cup whenever you want one
cons: Very prone to leaking, which can be frustrating
Heavy and awkward to transport when full

customer_reviews.title: I Liked it for a Couple Months
customer_reviews.text: But I couldn't get it to stop leaking. I tried teflon tape and a basin wrench but it's made a mess of my fridge too many times. To the garbage it goes...
customer_reviews.author: Barry Custom Carpentry

customer_reviews.title: Rust in nozzle
customer_reviews.text: Unboxed for the first time and found rust in the nozzle. Good thing I caught it before actually using it and risk ingesting harmful materials. Hopefully the second one around will be okay.
customer_reviews.author: G. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Leaking!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this. I love cold brew. Unfortunately it is leaking all over my fridge from the bottom of the device. What a waste of the coffee I bought. I even threw away the packaging it came in. I am waiting a response from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: Three Defective Units in a Row!
customer_reviews.text: I've never before taken the time to review anything, but this product is so disappointing that I'm making an exception. We've now had three different units sent to us, and none of them have been usable. The first one leaked out of the bottom seal, the second one had a chip in the glass, and the third one again leaked out of the bottom seal. The product looks very nice, and seems like it could be great - but there's go to be something wrong in their manufacturing an/or distribution processes. At this point, we're giving up on this product and will have to find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Leaks constantly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to save money by making cold brew at home. It's a great product; easy to use, convenient, easy to clean, and looks great, but its only flaw makes it absolutely unusable, it leaks 24/7. In the span of 24 hrs it had leaked over 1/3 of its capacity, all over my fridge.
customer_reviews.author: don’t look me up

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, very smooth coffee
customer_reviews.text: This thing has allowed me to stop putting sugar in my coffee. Cold brew is just so much less bitter. Just a little milk and it's ready to go! The only thing is I'm confused by people mentioning how much it needs to be diluted, it's very pleasant as is
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: Best Coffee on Earth
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Makes coffee that is better than the commercially sold stuff. Smooth, acid free and flavorful. Compact. Easy to clean. Not labor intensive. Only caveat is that is consumes more coffee grounds than traditionally brewed coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Maui Jim

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: It’s convenient, but its definitely on the pricey side. Im happy with it but it leaks... I have to clean my fridge from coffee stains every time I use this.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Almost Five Stars - Great Device
customer_reviews.text: Brews great tasting coffee. Not sure I will go to my Keurig again. Four stars due to....the spigot. It leaks at the bottom and drains slow. The device will accumulate a coffee type sludge on the bottom. That's why I think it drains slow. To get around this I've been pouring the contents into a glass jar that I shake to mix and keep in the fridge. I plan to contact the manufacturer to see if they'll send me a replacement spigot. If not it goes back for a replacement. Still a great device for coffee lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Comfortably Numb

customer_reviews.title: Leaked everywhere
customer_reviews.text: This product leaked all over our fridge even though the spout was closed. Yes I am sure the spout was closed.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon LaMoure

customer_reviews.title: Good buy to brew iced coffee at home
customer_reviews.text: If I could have designed an iced coffee maker myself, this would be it. I hesitated to buy this because of the price but I’m glad I did. It’s a very simple design with high quality materials and craftsmanship. I appreciate the small footprint so I can leave it in the fridge. However, it means I can only get about 3 glasses of iced coffee out of it per batch so I still have to brew multiple times per week. It’s also quite heavy so you have to be careful when washing it. Another con: the pour is pretty slow. It takes a minute to fill a 12oz glass.
customer_reviews.author: Lau

customer_reviews.title: It leaked all over the refrigerator and floor
customer_reviews.text: I finally opened this and on my first use it leaked all over my refrigerator and on my kitchen floor. The warnings from other customers are true. I had double checked that it was closed properly. I am not sure how any with this type of issue are getting sold.
customer_reviews.author: T'challa

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it seemed like the price was a little steep for what it is. But after a few uses, you start to understand the thought and attention to detail that when into the design and engineering of this. The bottom of the inside is a raised spiral of glass nooks, perfect for catching all the coffee dust, fine enough to make it through the filter. And boy, what a filter! This thing is well crafted. You can hardly see the holes. Overall A+
customer_reviews.author: Sathya

customer_reviews.title: It leaks!
customer_reviews.text: This Sucks! Not sure what’s going on but the damn thing just drips. Doesn’t matter what position I turn the knob on the nozzle, it just leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cold Brew Choice
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee maker. It's so easy to clean and stores in the fridge with easy access. The spout does not leak which is pretty awesome too. The coffee basket is large allowing you to cold brew both coffee or specialty teas. Highly recommend if you are considering a cold brew coffee maker. We had a pitcher styled one and you can't compare!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Love it, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this cold brew maker! It is easy to use, you just fill the basket with coffee grounds, pour water over the top and then let them soak for 24 hours. Once you pull out the basket the coffee concentrate lasts a couple weeks in the fridge. I pour it over ice and add some milk in the mornings, it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rose

customer_reviews.title: Drips
customer_reviews.text: It wont stop dripping, regardless how far i turn the nob, it feels shut and upon examining it, it visually appears closed however it has a constant slow drip and makes a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cold Brew Solution
customer_reviews.text: For me, this is the perfect cold-brew solution: 1) Makes great, delicious cold-brew concentrate 2) Easy to use 3) Easy to clean 4) Build quality is excellent I suggest going with the larger version if you drink a lot of coffee (I believe there is a 28 and 38 ounce version, I went with the larger version). One batch lasts me about 3 days. I suspect an average coffee drinker would get almost a week out of one batch. Unless something catastrophic happens, I expect this to product to last a lifetime, and that is really saying something.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product is horrible. I was so excited about this gift for my husband and it turned out to be horrible. It constantly leaks from somewhere even though the valve is technically closed. We’ve tried it a few times after checking to make sure everything was set and we’ve woken up to all the coffee drained and all throughout our fridge. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DELICOUS affordable and EASY
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I went from daily Starbucks visits to this and I’m obsessed. The concentrate only lasts me (one person household) a week. I don’t know my ratio to concentrate coffee vs cream vs water but I do love a strong cup. I grind Starbucks whole beans coarsely, use distilled water, leave in fridge 24 Hours, then give my bougainvillea the used grounds. It’s nice to have a QUICK and DELICOUS cup of coffee in the morning. Quality is top notch. The glass dispenser is heavy but compact enough to make it unobtrusive in your fridge. I’d buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: categ3893

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Speedy delivery! No more mess in terms of trying to get rid of the grounds - just pop the container out and toss all grounds in waste basket. I no longer dread making coffee. Only criticism - coffee comes out very slowly. If you like iced coffee - buy this! After dumping the grounds, I mix 1 can exaporated milk and 1/3 can condensed sweetened milk thoroughly together and add it to the concentrate. You can add more or less condensed milk to your sweetener preference. Yum!
customer_reviews.author: VK

customer_reviews.title: First timer making cold brew, coffee maker is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: First timer making cold brew, my Dr suggested cold brew for low acidity. I ran across this product , ordered and have not been disappointed. I make 2 batches weekly and this cold brew maker is perfect. Attractive design, easy to clean and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: This thing Rocks!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I fell in love with cold brew at Starbucks, but really did not like spending the money every day. Purchased this and now we have coffee from home most mornings. There might be cheaper versions out there, but this thing is quality!! The glass is thick and the tap is metal, quality!! Sticker shock is in affect, but do the math and it only takes a couple weeks and it's paid for itself. We purchase bulk coffee from Starbucks and have them grind it (course works great), you will get about 3 batches per 2 bags of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: redtimmy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design. Drips a little.
customer_reviews.text: The item is beautiful, as long as you don't mind the little drops of coffee that drip out of the spigot afterward. I didnt experience the leaks from inside the unit I heard other people complain about, but the drops of coffee in my fridge was enough to knock off a star. I do reccomend the cheese cloth liner inside the basket for ease of grinds removal, as well as being able to squeze that last bit of water out of the grinds. We found that leaving the basket in the unit all week works best for us, and we can refill the water once or twice without much loss of taste, but with an obvious reduction of strength.
customer_reviews.author: Strungul

customer_reviews.title: I can’t get enough of it
customer_reviews.text: I can’t even begin to describe how much I love this. I make cold brew twice a week in it. It’s very easy to use and clean and I get the perfect batch each time. You do need to use a thicker coffee grind with it, if you grind your coffee fine, it will go through the mesh basket.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Container of happiness
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much. It’s eash to use, easy to store, and looks nice in my fridge. I use local coffee ground to the coursest setting and let sit for 24 hours. My only complaint is that there is some sediment in the bottom of the container each time, possibly from the holes in the filter being a tad bit too large. But, this also could be from the fine bean debris that gets in my coffee grounds from where I get my beans ground at (Still looking for a good grinder for home). This is absolutely a worthy investment if you consume cold brew daily like I do.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn M.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible bitter coffee
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this out. I spend a fair amount of money each month buying bottled cold brew. When this machine, that I had my eye on for a while, went on sale I jumped at the chance to try it out. Over a month’s time I tried several different types of grounds, strengths and ratios of coffee to water. I tried milk, creamers and sweeteners to try and lessen the bitter (almost burnt) taste with no success at all. Of course all of this product testing put me past the return date. Amazon was unwilling to help. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Reed

customer_reviews.title: My mornings are thanking me for this!
customer_reviews.text: I love cold brew coffee and was really excited to make my own! I had no idea how easy and economical it would be, but more importantly how delicious! This cold brew set up is the perfect size, easy to use and clean and seems to be made of quality materials. Definitely recommend getting good coffee to make your cold brew (not the cheap stuff) because the flavor comes through so clearly!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made. Slightly pricey and initially wished it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made. Slightly pricey and initially wished it was bigger. But as I dilute the cold brew before drinking it, I get about 2 days worth of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: HowZstein

customer_reviews.title: but it looks good sitting in my fridge
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced for a cold brew coffee maker when you can make one yourself for a few bucks, but it looks good sitting in my fridge, and is nice and compact. The only real complaint I have other than the cost is you have to clean the spigot from time to time and its a pain to do. If you have the extra few bucks, and you're tired of spilling your contraption of a coffee maker in your fridge, this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love cold brew coffee but hadn’t taken it making it at home. I saw the kitchen air cold brew system in a FB group and decided to give it a shot. I’m extremely pleased with the quality of it. It’s very sturdy and was surprisingly heavy. The spout is easy to use and the mesh strainer basket keeps in all the grounds. I love that it’s all one unit. I’ve used a toddy system at work before and it was a pain I’m the neck. My only gripe is that I wish it made more concentrate. I drink a lot of coffee and am found through one batch quite fast.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Not enough bang for the bucksssssssss
customer_reviews.text: I will admit right off the bat that I did not actually use this coffee maker. When it arrived, the first thing I did was to put it in my fridge to see how much space it would take up. Then I measured how much actual coffee concentrate it could hold. I decided that it didn’t hold enough (i.e., way less than my Toddy Coffee carafe) concentrate to warrant all the space it took in the fridge. So, I returned it. I would like it a lot if they made one that was taller and held more concentrate. Then it would seem worth it to me. Also, the price seemed high to me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Porter

customer_reviews.title: It leaks
customer_reviews.text: The product would be amazing if they fixed the defective faucet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design, great coffee
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous, elegant, and it makes the best cold brew I’ve ever had. Made of heavy-gauge stainless steel and glass as solid as a wedding-gift ice bucket, with a clever tap and steeping insert with incredibly fine mesh. Great design and great coffee. I almost hate to keep it in the fridge because it looks so great on my counter. I balked a little at the price but it’s absolutely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: unfulfilled wishes

customer_reviews.title: Love Iced Coffee
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using this product and keeping it in the fridge as an on-the-go option. I do have two observations which are related. First, ive found hat the ratio in the instruction book makes the coffee incredibly weak. I utilize a mixture primarily of the concentrate - if you use the recommended amount of water, it ruins it. Second, I wish the container held more coffee. These are simple fixes, you just need to make the coffee more often!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great Cold Brew Maker.
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have so far is that coffee dispenses slower than I would prefer. I highly recommend this over the pitcher. Easier to clean. Looks sleeker in the fridge. My only regret is that I didn't select the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: PinkTwig

customer_reviews.title: The solution!
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with bottled cold brew from Trader Joe so I decided to make my own using my French press. It never tasted right and it was never strong enough. After reading endless reviews on every cold brew maker out there, I decide to splurge on the Kitchenaid cold brew machine and I am over the moon with the result. Easy to use and wonder smooth, strong brew. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laraine Brokaw

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, easy to use and delicious!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product.... smooth velvet-like cold brew. Full bodied taste minus the bitterness of a hot brew. One more reason to brew at home! No leaks. Easy to use. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: LHC_Tech

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and fits on my fridge shelf. When used according to directions makes very concentrated coffee, when I remove the filter basket with grounds at 24 hours I then fill it with water and still need to dilute more when using! Very sturdy and attractive unit.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: A definite winner...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cold brewer one year ago. It’s FABULOUS ... If you love cold coffee, this is PERFECT.. It is well built with thick glass and real metal. I’ll never have to drink bitter coffee that was hot brewed then chilled. Coarse grind definitely works the best. I leave it on a shelf in the refrigerator. If you want a jolt of caffeine, try it with little or no dilution. If you like it a bit weaker, dilute to your liking. I would highly recommend this item to cold coffee lovers. Simple to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Get this.
customer_reviews.text: This puppy is insanely easy to use. I am a cold brew purchaser, not maker. I eventually came to terms with my budget and gave up Starbucks every day but needed a replacement. I am so happy I got this!! Seriously, a kid could follow these instructions. And washing it is a dream, everything comes apart super fast and dries good too.
customer_reviews.author: Nina A.

customer_reviews.title: It’s so easy!
customer_reviews.text: This is brilliant. The most amazing cold brew system. The mesh is so fine and easy to take care of. It’s sturdy, handles well, and looks great in any fridge. My only complaint is the faucet spot is a tad slow. Be sure to purchase a coarse blend for your coffee. I prefer these two types.
customer_reviews.author: driftjunke24

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for cold brew lovers
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, well-made, easy to use piece of equipment. I wanted to make decaf cold brew at home (since you can't buy it anywhere). So simple to use and doesn't take up a lot of space. Instructions tell you how much coffee to use, plus there's a fill line on the stainless steel basket to help you. Would make the perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: jerseyJD

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! Easy to set up and use. After the pic I put it in the fridge. Fits nicely. I wish amazon sold the stand that is pictured with this. I found the stand on the kitchen aid site for $20.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: ... waited a couple months so I could give a good review and wow this thing is better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I waited a couple months so I could give a good review and wow this thing is better than expected. The coffee that comes out is true cold brew concentrate. Easy to use and amazingly easy to clean. Spend the extra on this you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: toddinnv

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to the fill line for grounds!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been into cold brew for several years, both buying the brands from the grocery store and also frequenting the local coffee shops. I finally decided to find something that I could use at home and save some money. My 2nd batch is brewing currently and I’m happy to say I’m ‘in love’ with this brewer. It’s so easy to use...as long as you follow the directions. Make sure to not exceed the fill line in the basket for the grounds - I did that on my first batch and the brewer leaked all over my refrigerator...I was NOT a happy camper that night. This batch is 12 hours in and no leaks!! I’ll be making a batch weekly.
customer_reviews.author: budthecat

customer_reviews.title: BEST coffee ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This makes coffee that is so smooth and tasty that I practically guzzle it! I drink my coffee iced year round and used to brew a pot and use it for a few days. This is a much better option. The coffee tastes amazing and I love it. My family came to visit and loved it so much they bought one too! Makes great coffee, hot or cold. I use coarse ground dark Sumatra.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Over-engineered goodness
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for its design, I looked at various other jugs and things but this seemed to be the best thought out. First thing I noticed is it's really well made and heavy. Great coffee too and slides regards fht into the fridge
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Whitechapel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and works great
customer_reviews.text: So pretty and sleek. Love it. Mine doesn't leak, and its sturdy. I had seen it at target but it was sold out. I bought this xl size, peridot could have bought just the regular size because it holds a lot of water/coffee. I also live the square shape - easier to put in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Kd

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and effective
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Cold brews in 24 hours or less. Fill the bucket with 9 oz (330 grams) coffee grounds and 42 oz filtered water. Good for brewing batches of cold brew concentrate. Each morning I drink about 6 oz of the concentrate, and that’s all the caffeine I need.
customer_reviews.author: Panah N

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, but space-intensive
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a well made, high quality product. The filter is crazy fine and the tap is such a nice touch. The only thing I wish were different is the space requirements. Cold brewing takes a lot of grounds and water to make a small amount of coffee. So the container is only about 1/10 of the way full when you finish brewing and remove the grounds. This would be fine, but if you don’t have much fridge space it can be frustrating. All in all, an amazing product and I love having it! Cleaning is easy and doesn’t take much time.
customer_reviews.author: ashley raines

customer_reviews.title: the best cold brew system
customer_reviews.text: I've had the cold brew system about 3 weeks and have used it non stop. I seep my coffee grounds for 24 hours. I bought a glass pitcher that I fill up and brew another batch simultaneously. The cold brew taste great and its very convent to use. Feels sturdy and built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Manny 760

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after just a couple uses!!
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed the cold brew but not even two months use and it leaks. So expensive and so disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: jpar7

customer_reviews.title: Makes delicious cold brew
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to cold brew coffee and this product is fantastic! It's easy instructions, brewed overnight in the fridge, delicious coffee ready for me in the morning. It did take me a few tries on how I preferred to drink it. I ended up with a splash of SF Vanilla syrup, Unsweetened Almond Milk and ice cubes in a large glass. I'm saving so much money by making my own and not going to Starbucks or any other coffeehouse that often.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Teter

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my boyfriend because he loves getting the cold brew coffee at Dunkin Donuts. He absolutely loves this, and so do I. Easy clean up, and the coffee is amazing. I like the design a lot, and that it does not take up nearly as much space in the fridge as some other cold brew coffee makers. I am a big fan of the spout, you don't even have to take this out of the fridge to pour the coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa-Marie B.

customer_reviews.title: The Coffee
customer_reviews.text: Drinking cold coffee for many years and really despise hot coffee. The cold coffee was easily made, but wanted to go a step further with the purchase of a cold coffee maker. Presently, the coffee maker is sitting in the fridge, which will be there for 24 hours. Relying on other reviews about the cold coffee maker, is the reason it was purchased
customer_reviews.author: Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Leaks!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 4 months ago. I have LOVED it up until now. It’s leaking from 2 spots in the bottom all of a sudden. I have only hand washed it and always been very careful. Now there’s a complete mess and waste of coffee every time I try to use it. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee W

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE BEST COLD BREW COFFEE MAKER
customer_reviews.text: I Only drink iced coffee and this has got to be the best cold coffee brew i have ever used it's built very well and very easy to use. AND WHEN YOU THINK ABOUT IT WE ARE MAKING COLD BREW WHICH DUNKIN AND STARBUCKS SELL FOR A LOT MORE THAN THEIR REGULAR COFFEE.
customer_reviews.author: FOCHEF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you want delicious coffee all over your fridge
customer_reviews.text: The valve to pour the coffee leaks intermittently, resulting in unpredictable spills. I really expect higher quality from this brand, especially at this price point. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Liquid keep dripping
customer_reviews.text: The item may be faulty ? The liquid drips through the tap... who likes to handle the inconvenience of liquid all over the fridge & cumbersome to wipe. Better take the risk this might happen when you purchase - too bad I never heed advise from other review. So at the end, I only used it for water...an expensive water container in the fridge. I will discard when I am fed up !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No leaking! Takes experimenting for perfect taste.
customer_reviews.text: People who complain of leaking are not properly cleaning it. After each use you should run warm water through to wash out any small grounds that might get in the valve. Also, I have found that draining it immediately after putting the coffee and water in will wash out that bitterness and lead to less sediment. For the perfect taste just add coffee then water, drain it out and add more water and let it sit overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting iced coffee
customer_reviews.text: Makes great ice coffee. Love the look and ease of use. Only reason for 4 star overall rating is that it doesn’t make enough. I wish it was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gober

customer_reviews.title: Six months later and I love this Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: Six months later and I love this Coffee Maker! The ease of cleanup beats other cold brew methods hands down.
customer_reviews.author: KEW

customer_reviews.title: I am so excited about this!
customer_reviews.text: My father-in-law got me this for Christmas, I’ve been using it for a week or so now and I am so happy!- no more stopping for ice coffee or going out to get it I can now make it right at home.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Cold Brew
customer_reviews.text: I should have purchased the larger one, I love coffee too much and cold brew is my go to. I spend way too much money daily getting cold brew while I’m out and about but this definitely helps me cut down on costs! It says to steep the grounds for 12-24 hours but I always step mine for 48 hours. Mix with creamer and water, Add Ice and you have the the perfect cold brew!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylie Joy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! I bought this for my husband for his ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I bought this for my husband for his birthday. We love cold brew in the summer. Its easy to use and very handy as you can store it right in the fridge for dispensing. The carafe itself is heavy glass of good quality and easy to clean. Well worth the money! We grind our beans fresh for each batch and its a very strong concentrate. We can add water, cream, flavors, etc to our individual tastes. You must buy one if you love cold brew!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use cold brew coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: This is such a well made, easy to use cold brew coffee maker! It's made of thick glass, very easy to clean and keeps coffee very cold. It could easily be used for tea or even just as a water dispenser. I would def. purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great product if it worked
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this product, set it all up. Then when I came down and opened my fridge in the morning it had leaked everywhere. I tried to fix it, but it continued to leak. Ended up returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Simple and mess-free
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Compact and perfect size for fridge. I had a different cold brew product which left a mess in the counter and grounds in the coffee. There is no mess involved with this product and the coffee tastes so smooth I can actually drink it black.
customer_reviews.author: Kori Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Must have for coffee lovers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend and he LOVES it! Its very easy to use. It has a manual on how much coffee and water to add and how long to leave it for. Sometimes he forgets about it and leaves it too long, resulting in bitter coffee, but you can just add more water and make it taste great again.
customer_reviews.author: Amalia Cordero

customer_reviews.title: Easy and delish
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. We bought it after hearing someone speak highly of it while we were out one night. Seemed like a fitting Father’s Day present. It’s easy to use and makes delish coffee drinks!
